ModMetaData.name: United Galactic Confederacy - Rimworld Edition
ModMetaData.author: Fenoxo Fenfen
ModMetaData.description:
United Galactic Confederacy - Rimworld Edition
Fresh from a bevy of trials in the galaxy's most tainted space comes the Rimworld-friendly incarnation of the United Galactic Confederacy! This loose conglomerate of various human and alien xenotypes expands its territory in a once every 200 year event called the Planet Rush! Now with this mod, they have arrived at your home on the rim.
Factions: -Corportate UGC - hostile and greedy. -Rusher UGC - generally friendly.
Xenotypes Added: -WIP - Ausar (canine), Kaithrit (feline), Slyveren (Reptilian),
